Text: Thank you for this u/l. The historical event was deplorable, grotesque, a horrific war crime. I am surprised China has not retaliated by now and bombed Japan into the Stone Age. It may well happen....

If only China wasn't in a civil war when the Japanese invaded, they would have a much better chance repelling the invading Japanese. Both sides of the Chinese military (Kuomintang & Communists) were exhausted because they've been fighting each other ever since 1927. All because Sun Yat-sen died too early.
